data.message: There are so many great people out there that we just don't appreciate. Thank you for this information.

replies.message: You're very welcome, Cathy! Have a great rest of your day. -Elizabeth

Facebook way to go!  Let’s see more of these stories on here. Thank you.
Wouldn't it be nice if ALL news stations would report nothing but good news for a week-maybe even a day! I know, extreme wishful thinking, good news doesn't sell.
Thank you for posting this video. How often we go about our daily routine without noticing the unsung heroes that make out lives better. ❤️
